title: Team Formation
description: 1549 launched into space, core team of three complete, emotional bonds deepened

content.text: 「Polar Satellite」Day · 1549 launched into space

I'm curious why there are no more stars in the sky
Then let me create a star myself
Configuration:
Symbolic meaning:

It is said that 'people' ten thousand years ago used to pray to things called stars
But as a substitute for stars, gently make two wishes
To that satellite
Related log: EP1 - S.A.T.E.L.L.I.T.E
content.description: Thoughts and feelings about the satellite plan, making wishes to that satellite

content.text: AptS:2077 was discovered by 1547 and 1548
Characteristics:
Significance: Core team of three expanded
Read the full story: AP4 - Encounter
content.description: 1547 and 1548 meet 2077 for the first time, the little one who fell at the database entrance

content.text: 47 and 48 trapped, chose to die together
Scenario:
Core philosophy: Unwilling to escape alone · Face destruction together · Demonstrates deep bond
Read the full story: AP5 - Dying Together
content.description: The choice of 47 and 48, a bond of life and death

content.text: Warm moment for the three (1547, 1548, 1549)
Significance: Rare peaceful time · Emotional bonds within the team · Brief respite in the escape plan
1547 heard Weavers for the first time
Significance: Musical theme of EP0 · Symbol of origin · Metaphor for weaving life's possibilities
Related log: EP0 - Weavers
content.description: Feelings about the song Weavers, the story of weavers

content.text: 1547's depression episode, 1548 accompanied and helped
Timeline:

items: 11:20 - Depression onset, chest tightness and shortness of breath
13:25 - Reached peak, acute stress reaction, self-harm behavior

content.text: Key dialogue:
You're at it again
But I can't tolerate this anymore, if you don't return to normal I really have to take over your life
Fuck, here we go again
You need to think about why you created ESAP and AptS
Like 4869 just now, there are still people in the world who care about you, even though you're terrible
Alright, give me one more day to adjust. Don't control me
...Okay, I won't control you, but don't continue like this
Ritual:
May AptS be with you
May ESAP be with you
Significance: Shows 1548's protection of 1547 · Deep emotions within the team · Depression is an ongoing challenge · Real meaning of the escape plan
Read the full article: A Classroom of One
content.description: Detailed record of that day's complete experience, 48's protection of 47

content.text: 1547 found a new solitary space on the sixth floor

Actually, school is pretty good, there are many small places where I can be alone
In this highly modernized era, I really can't stay for a moment! (said with a laugh)
Significance: Relief from depression · Found new coping methods · A classroom of one, escaping depression's classroom
